attributes.action: Halt despoiling of the Green Belt by making illegal dumping on greenfield sites a criminal offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, unscrupulous individuals can dump waste materials such as rubble on green field sites, at which point it becomes an enforcement matter for the local authority.  Since fly-tipping is criminal, so should dumping e.g. of building waste and aggregates without permission.  A current example exists at Waltham St Lawrence, in the Royal Borough of Windsor & Maidenhead.
